meta.prevIdentifier: Dogma: Red in Cog and Claw

rules.description: Roll a D6 each time a model with this dogma is slain or flees . on a 6 that model refuses to yield; either the wound that slew it is ignored or the model does not flee. However, <FORGE WORLD> units with this dogma cannot Fall Back unless there is a friendly <FORGE WORLD> Character on the battlefield.
rules.name: Dogma: Refusal To Yield
